name: Special Offers
description:
Ace your base crust: thick, regular OR thin
Let's get saucy: regular (tomato), BBQ, chilli OR curry

Topping allergen:
* Ham - cooked reformed ham (75%) with added water
* Chilli beef - with added water
* Beef meatballs - wheat/gluten, oats/gluten, sulphites, eggs
* Sliced sausage - wheat/gluten, sulphites, soya
* Fajita chicken - mustard
* Rustic chorizo - milk
* Falafel - gluten/wheat
* Tuna - fish
* Anchovies - fish
* Feta cheese - milk
* Parmesan cheese shake - milk
* Tikka chicken - Not in recipe but may contain mustard & tree nut

name: Pizzas
description:
Fresh dough made daily by hand
All pizzas have a tomato base topped with cheese unless otherwise specified
09" Reduced gluten

Ace your base crust: thick, regular OR thin
Let's get saucy: regular (tomato), BBQ, chilli OR curry 

Free toppings: oregano, basil, chilli flakes, garlic flakes, fresh garlic, parmesan cheese shake & black pepper. Other toppings are available 

07" Personal - 4 Slices
09" Small - 6 Slices
12" Medium - 8 Slices
14" Large - 10 Slices
16" Monster - 12 Slices

Topping allergen:
* Ham - cooked reformed ham (75%) with added water
* Chilli beef - with added water
* Beef meatballs - wheat/gluten, oats/gluten, sulphites, eggs
* Sliced sausage - wheat/gluten, sulphites, soya
* Fajita chicken - mustard
* Rustic chorizo - milk
* Falafel - gluten/wheat
* Tuna - fish
* Anchovies - fish
* Feta cheese - milk
* Parmesan cheese shake - milk
* Tikka chicken - Not in recipe but may contain mustard & tree nut
